name: The Tunnel Under the World
description:
The Tunnel Under the World is a game based on the science fiction short story of the same title by Frederik Pohl.

The game touches upon the following themes: marketing and consumerism, moral values and the meaning of life in modern times, materialism in capitalist society, human beings in the age of technology, illusory reality, reiteration of the day-to-day life and nuclear holocaust.

Credits:

DENZI (http://www3.wind.ne.jp/DENZI/diary/);
Bush (http://blog-buch.rhcloud.com); Kieff; jcrown41; DezrasDragons; Jason-Em; Justin Nichol; Vander Silvio da Silva Jr.; Disthron; Umz.

Music:
Patrick Maney; Jordan Hake.
"Flight of the Bumblebee" by N.Rimsky-Korsakov, arranged and looped by Johan Brodd

Sound effects:
Devin Watson; Little Robot Sound Factory (www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com).
Java code: Valentin Gruzdev.

Rabbit -Surge:
Art by DezrasDragons (http://opengameart.org/users/dezrasdragons) based on a rendition of an original character by the OpenSurge Team (http://opensnc.sourceforge.net), as commissioned by OpenGameArt.org (http://opengameart.org) and drawn by Stephen "Redshrike" Challener; an original character design by Jason-Em (opengameart.org/"users/jason-em).
